video_title: How Trauma Affects Your Attachment Style
transcript:
we also have evidence that shows that
trauma correlates with changes in
attachment style so the more traumatized
you are so in the cases of severe severe
trauma we'll see a disorganized
attachment style and that is all about
how you connect to other people you
connect to other people in a
disorganized way so we'll see things
like an anxious attachment style where
if your needs were not met sometimes we
become anxiously attached and we become
clingy which will affect our
relationships sometimes we have an
avoidant attachment style where our
emotional vulnerabilities punished us so
we work very very very hard to be
emotionally unavailable that will
absolutely affect your relationships
